actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and Safety.

official_title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to require the Secretary of Labor to prepare an economic impact analysis in connection with the promulgation of occupational safety and health standards.

summary.text: Amends the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to direct the Secretary of Labor to prepare an economic impact analysis in connection with the promulgation of occupational safety and health standards.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to require the Secretary of Labor to prepare an economic impact analysis in connection with the promulgation of occupational safety and health standards.
